text.text: Enrolled in B.Tech ECE with specialization in AI/ML.

text.headline: Learned HTML & CSS
text.text: Began web development with core frontend technologies.

text.headline: DSA with Python
text.text: Started solving problems on arrays, strings, stacks, and linked lists on platforms like LeetCode and GFG.

text.headline: Python in Depth
text.text: Explored core Python concepts, OOPs, libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and automation tools.

text.headline: Learned ML/DL/NLP
text.text: Dived into Machine Learning, Deep Learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch), and Natural Language Processing using Transformers.

text.headline: HackFinance @ IIIT-Delhi
text.text:
Built a fintech project at IIIT-Delhi's HackFinance, securing a Top 30 position among 500+ participants. Developed an AI-powered chatbot to simplify stock market concepts, offered personalized investment insights, enabled dummy trading for risk-free learning, and integrated gamification to enhance user engagement.
GitHub Repo | Live Demo

text.headline: AI4HUMANITY @ NSUT
text.text:
Developed an AI-powered Instant Health Companion that diagnoses symptoms, locates nearby hospitals with real-time bed availability, costs, and insurance details, enables advance bed booking, and offers an intuitive user interfaceâ€”ranked in the Top 20 at NSUTâ€™s flagship AI hackathon..

text.headline: Trading Signal Project
text.text:
Created a tool that uses machine learning to generate buy/sell signals based on stock trends and technical indicators.
GitHub Repo | Live Demo

text.headline: Mini Research Tool Project
